title: Verano: How To Succeed In U.S. Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Chief Investment Officer Aaron Miles shares why Verano (VRNOF) got dinged when it went public and how it's shaping its strategy as the market continues to develop. We discuss the Goodness Growth (GDNSF) acquisition, New York's protracted timeline and investing dollars at the right time. One of the top MSOs, find out why Seeking Alpha authors and Wall Street analysts rate Verano as a Strong Buy and why momentum is a concern.

We discuss the Goodness Growth (GDNSF) acquisition, New York's protracted timeline and investing dollars at the right time. One of the top MSOs, find out why Seeking Alpha authors and Wall Street analysts rate Verano as a Strong Buy and why momentum is a concern.
